summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to issue a permit to the owner or owners of Lots 2, 3 and 4, in Block 37, Denny & Hoyt's Addition to the City of Seattle, recorded in Volume 2 of Plat, Page 136, except portion condemned by Ordinance No. 21303, to construct and maintain a regulation driveway across the sidewalks on the south side of North 36th Street, in front of said lots.
